posts._title: Andrzej Baranski – Pare osób, maly czas (2005)
posts.title: Pare osób, maly czas
posts.excerpt: Quote:The friendship of the eccentric poet Miron Białoszewski and the blind Jadwiga Stańczakowa changes the lives of both heroes. In the leading roles, Krystyna Janda and Andrzej Hudziak.

posts.title: The Eagle
posts.excerpt: Plot Synopsis from allmovie:Based on a Pushkin novel, The Eagle stars Rudolph Valentino as a Russian cossack who is the special favorite of the formidable Catherine the Great (Louise Dresser). He spurns her attentions, preferring not to be a kept consort. When his lands are stolen from him, Valentino transforms into a Robin-Hood-like masked avenger. …

posts._title: Radu Jude – Îmi este indiferent daca în istorie vom intra ca barbari AKA I Do Not Care If We Go Down in History as Barbarians (2018) (HD)
posts.title: Îmi este indiferent daca în istorie vom intra ca barbari
posts.excerpt: Synopsis“I do not care if we go down in history as barbarians.” These words, spoken in the Council of Ministers of the summer of 1941, started the ethnic cleansing on the Eastern Front. Radu Jude’s resonant feature chronicles a young theatre director’s efforts to stage an accurate re-enactment of the Odessa Massacre in which Romanian …

posts._title: Michael Radford & Massimo Troisi – Il postino AKA The Postman (1994)
posts.title: Il postino
posts.excerpt: Quote:Set in the year 1950, Pablo Neruda, the famous Chilean poet, is exiled to a small island in Italy for political reasons. His wife accompanies him. posts.title: The Blue Planet
posts.excerpt: Quote:Our planet is a blue planet: over seventy percent of it is covered by the sea. The Pacific Ocean alone covers half the globe. posts._title: Samuel Fuller – The Baron of Arizona (1950)
posts.title: The Baron of Arizona
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Thirty years before Arizona achieves statehood, scam artist James Addison Reavis (Vincent Price) cooks up an elaborate scheme to claim the territory as his own. posts.title: Where’s Jack?
posts.excerpt: The adventures and the exploits of notorious English thief and prison-breaker Jack Sheppard in 1720s London.
